original_title: HUTCH honored among Sri Lanka’s Best Employer Brands 2025
original_body_lines: Hutch Telecommunications Lanka Pvt Ltd has been recognized with the Sri Lanka Best Employer Brand Award 2025, reaffirming its status as one of the nation’s most progressive and people-focused organizations. The accolade was presented on 10th September at Taj Samudra, Colombo, by the World Federation of HR Professionals, in celebration of organizations that set benchmarks in human resource development and employer branding.

The award highlights HUTCH’s success in aligning its human resource strategy with business goals while cultivating a future-ready workforce. Through a strong focus on continuous learning, leadership development, and employee well-being, HUTCH has consistently demonstrated its ability to foster a culture of growth, inclusivity, and innovation within the telecommunications sector.

At the heart of this recognition lies HUTCH’s commitment to empowering its people as the true drivers of organizational excellence. The company has adopted a holistic approach to HR management, combining structured training programs, leadership pathways, and wellness initiatives with effective marketing communications that reinforce its identity as an employer of choice.

This latest achievement underscores HUTCH’s belief that investing in people is fundamental to sustaining business performance and shaping industry leadership. By earning the Sri Lanka Best Employer Brand Award 2025, HUTCH further strengthens its employer brand, inspires future talent, and reinforces its role in contributing to Sri Lanka’s evolving business landscape.
